@graph.name: pineapple halwa recipe | pineapple delight recipe | pineapple sweet or meetha
@graph.description: pineapple halwa recipe | pineapple delight recipe | pineapple sweet or meetha

recipeInstructions.text: firstly, in a mixi jar take 2 cup pineapple and 1 cup juice.
recipeInstructions.name: firstly, in a mixi jar take 2 cup pineapple and 1 cup juice.

recipeInstructions.text: blend smooth making sure the chunks are ground well.
recipeInstructions.name: blend smooth making sure the chunks are ground well.

recipeInstructions.text: now strain the juice extracting the pineapple juice. you can alternatively take 3 cup pineapple juice here.
recipeInstructions.name: now strain the juice extracting the pineapple juice. you can alternatively take 3 cup pineapple juice here.

recipeInstructions.text: now add 1 cup cornflour to the pineapple juice and mix using a whisk.
recipeInstructions.name: now add 1 cup cornflour to the pineapple juice and mix using a whisk.

recipeInstructions.text: further, add 1 cup water and prepare a smooth consistency batter. keep aside.
recipeInstructions.name: further, add 1 cup water and prepare a smooth consistency batter. keep aside.

recipeInstructions.text: in a large kadai take 2 cup sugar and 1 cup water.
recipeInstructions.name: in a large kadai take 2 cup sugar and 1 cup water.

recipeInstructions.text: stir well until the sugar dissolves and comes to a boil.
recipeInstructions.name: stir well until the sugar dissolves and comes to a boil.

recipeInstructions.text: once the sugar syrup comes to a boil, add prepared pineapple mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: once the sugar syrup comes to a boil, add prepared pineapple mixture.

recipeInstructions.text: keep stirring continuously, keeping the flame on low to medium.
recipeInstructions.name: keep stirring continuously, keeping the flame on low to medium.

recipeInstructions.text: after 5 minutes, the mixture will start to thicken.
recipeInstructions.name: after 5 minutes, the mixture will start to thicken.

recipeInstructions.text: add ½ tsp yellow food colour and give a good mix. food colour is optional, it makes the delight attractive.
recipeInstructions.name: add ½ tsp yellow food colour and give a good mix. food colour is optional, it makes the delight attractive.

recipeInstructions.text: now add 2 tbsp ghee and continue to cook.
recipeInstructions.name: now add 2 tbsp ghee and continue to cook.

recipeInstructions.text: the ghee is absorbed completely.
recipeInstructions.name: the ghee is absorbed completely.

recipeInstructions.text: further, add 2 tbsp more ghee and continue to cook. i have used a total of 6 tbsp of ghee in batches.
recipeInstructions.name: further, add 2 tbsp more ghee and continue to cook. i have used a total of 6 tbsp of ghee in batches.

recipeInstructions.text: keep stirring until the mixture will start to hold shape and separate the pan.
recipeInstructions.name: keep stirring until the mixture will start to hold shape and separate the pan.

recipeInstructions.text: also, add ¼ tsp cardamom powder and 2 tbsp nuts. mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: also, add ¼ tsp cardamom powder and 2 tbsp nuts. mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: transfer the mixture to a box lined with parchment paper and topped with nuts.
recipeInstructions.name: transfer the mixture to a box lined with parchment paper and topped with nuts.

recipeInstructions.text: level up making sure it is of uniform thickness.
recipeInstructions.name: level up making sure it is of uniform thickness.

recipeInstructions.text: rest for 2 hours or until the dessert is set well.
recipeInstructions.name: rest for 2 hours or until the dessert is set well.

recipeInstructions.text: cut into the shape of your choice and garnish with chopped nuts.
recipeInstructions.name: cut into the shape of your choice and garnish with chopped nuts.

recipeInstructions.text: finally, enjoy pineapple delight or pineapple halwa topped with more nuts.
recipeInstructions.name: finally, enjoy pineapple delight or pineapple halwa topped with more nuts.

review.reviewBody:
Excellent. Thinking if other fruit can be also used for change. Mango pulp, peaches, apple sauce (w/walnuts, brown sugar, cinnamon). More ideas?
Would artificial sweeteners work instead of sugar?
How to store it and for how long?
Thank you for your recipes.

recipeInstructions.text: आगे ¼ टीस्पून हल्दी, 1 टीस्पून मिर्च पाउडर और 1 टीस्पून नमक डालें।

recipeInstructions.text: मसालों को बिना जलाये सॉट करें।

recipeInstructions.text: अब कम फ्लेम पर 1 कप बेसन डालें और सॉट करें।

recipeInstructions.text: 5 मिनट के लिए या जब तक बेसन सुनहरा और सुगंधित नहीं हो जाता है, तब तक सॉट करें।

recipeInstructions.text: इसके अलावा, ¼ कप पानी छिड़कें और अच्छी तरह मिलाएं।

recipeInstructions.text: जब तक मिश्रण नम नहीं हो जाता तब तक बैचों में पानी छिड़कते रहें।
